abstract: Chile defeats Argentina, 4-2, in penalty kicks, to win Copa America; Argentine star Lionel Messi shocks fans by suggesting that his national team career is over.

headline.kicker: Chile 0, Argentina 0 | Copa América | Chile wins on penalty kicks, 4-2
headline.content_kicker: Chile 0, Argentina 0 | Copa América Final | Chile wins on penalty kicks, 4-2
headline.print_headline: Miss by Messi Dazes Argentina  Before Chileans Survive a Brawl
headline.main: Lionel Messi and Argentina Miss Again as Chile Wins Copa América

snippet: Lionel Messi missed Argentina’s first attempt in a penalty shootout; after the game, he suggested that he was quitting the national team.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi missed Argentina’s first attempt in a penalty shootout; after the game, he suggested that he was quitting the national team.
